How many threads JMeter can support?
  • There are multiple variables involved to get better performance such as Heap Memory, System Configuration etc.
  • Below formula helps you to calculate the total number of concurrent threads.
The total number of concurrent user = (total allocable memory)/(Size of all requests)

How many threads Locust can support?
  • Locust supports running load tests distributed over multiple machines, and can therefore be used to simulate millions of simultaneous users. It is recommended to use cloud provider to simulate unlimited number of concurrent users for large scale tests.
